meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a punk
meanings.sent1: The punkiest hairstyle I've ever seen was dyed bright green.
meanings.sent2: She wore the punkiest outfit to the concert, complete with spikes and chains.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a punkiest look with mismatched socks and a bow tie was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti-covered alley had the punkiest vibe, making it feel rebellious and edgy.
meanings.sent5: The punkiest music blared from the speakers, causing everyone to dance wildly.

meanings.sent1: That is the punkiest jacket I have ever seen, covered in safety pins and patches.
meanings.sent2: She had the punkiest attitude in the room, not caring what anyone else thought.
meanings.sent3: His punkiest dance moves made everyone laugh and join in on the fun.
meanings.sent4: The punkiest graffiti art on the wall was a masterpiece of rebellion and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The punkiest skateboarder in the park pulled off the most daring tricks with ease.
